extendedInfo.description: The COBRA Golf Fit N Fly app is part calculator, part education tool. Although all the clubs, their features and benefits from COBRA's 2013 line are showcased, the true value of the FIt N Fly app lies in the three calculators - Driver Fitting, Long Game Gap Fitting and Iron Fitting. By answering some simple questions, the app can recommend options for virtually every club in your bag, including MyFly settings (COBRA's proprietary loft adjustability technology).

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Nice app, but can go no further than the opening screen, maybe an update to allow it to work ?
reviews.author: Bri Duffus

reviews.title: Wth
reviews.comment: Way to big for my screen, I cant see everything, at all times ????
reviews.author: Jack Rhodes

reviews.title: Hard to see
reviews.comment: The app comes in as portrait setting on my phone and there are no adjustments. Since I can\'t see much and read everything I deleted the app. I am sure there is a lot of good info, but I wasn\'t able to access it properly. Let me know when there is an update and I will try it again.
reviews.author: Craig Reil
